trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Carlsbad
There was one other sighting in Carlsbad on or around October 12th 2013
Summary: My friend observed ufo with friend it was still then moved slowly while blinking light and reflecting sun off surface he sent me pics which i include
divs: Sighting DetailsI was told by my friend he and a buddy were in carlsbad when his buddy noticed ufo first because sunlight was reflected off surface they observed for about 10 min at which time he snapped pics of object he said it hovered and slowly moved to the left then stopped blinked a red light and slowly moved northeast until object dissapeared and noone else seemed to notice object
